Package org.svvrl.goal.gui.menu

Class MenuFactory

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.gui.menu.MenuFactory
public class MenuFactory
extends java.lang.Object
This object is used to initialize a menu bar or a menu.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    static class  MenuFactory.ComponentDescriptor

  • Method Details

    • addComponentDescriptor

      public static void addComponentDescriptor​(java.lang.String cls_name, java.lang.String container, MenuFactory.ComponentDescriptor desc)
      Inserts a component descriptor for a menu component.
      Parameters:
      cls_name - the class name of the component
      container - the class of the component's container
      desc - the descriptor of the component

    • getComponentDescriptor

      public static MenuFactory.ComponentDescriptor getComponentDescriptor​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns a descriptor of components with a specified unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID
      Returns:
      a descriptor of components with ID id

    • insertMenus

      public static void insertMenus​(Window win, java.awt.Container container)
      Inserts menus and menu items to a container.
      Parameters:
      win - the GOAL window containing container
      container - a container to be initialized
